summary:
The code defines a tracing module for aiohttp, a Python asynchronous HTTP client/server library. It imports necessary modules and defines a `TraceConfig` class with various trace event parameters. The `TraceConfig` class provides a property `on_connection_create_end` which returns a signal (a callback function) that can be used to monitor or debug the end of a connection creation.
The user wants a summary of the functionality of the code. They gave a snippet of code from aiohttp/tracing.py. They want a summary in Chinese (or Chinese/English). They also gave requirements: start directly with the summary content, no "This code does..." or "Here is...". Focus on business logic, inputs, outputs. Use Chinese.
